forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. North wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a generous sun, casting a warm golden hue over the city. Temperatures hint at a mild 62, though a gentle north wind stirs, nudging the warmth to a cooler embrace of 58 as the clock moves towards evening. There’s a notable clarity in the air, unmarred by any fog or marine layer, allowing sights of the Golden Gate Bridge and the undulating hills to flourish against the azure sky. The distant whispers of the waves reflect the sunlight, creating a shimmering panorama that invites exploration.

As twilight approaches, the skies will maintain their partly cloudy demeanor, comfortably settling into a low of around 49. Dress accordingly; consider embracing layers that include a light jacket for the evening chill, complemented by comfortable shoes ideal for an urban stroll. Today’s rare crispness in the air beckons one to meander through the streets, perhaps stopping at a cozy café for a warm drink while the city hums gently around you. The day offers the perfect balance of serenity and activity, urging you to savor the simple joys of the season.
